Detailed Description

Interface for objects that approximate a given state as a weighted average of other states.

Such averages are used to approximate the model of a given state using data averaged from visited states, as well as to approximate the value of a given state using the values of a fixed finite set of states.

virtual const StateDistribution& Average::basis_weights (  )  const [pure virtual]

Returns:
A mapping of states to UNNORMALIZED weights. Each state reference in the mapping is non-NULL.
